I liked the humor in this game, the new mechanics as well as the old that make Portal so unique, and the story element. I would recommend Portal 2 to other players that appreciate puzzle games with a colorful story.

If you play with a friend who actually use his/her brain, then you are in the god damn heaven here in co-op mode.

100/100
Portal is perfect. Portal 2 is not. It's something better than that. It's human: hot-blooded, silly, poignant, irreverent, base, ingenious and loving. It's never less than a pure video game, but it's often more, and it will no doubt stand as one of the best entertainments in any medium at the end of this year. It's a masterpiece.
Yes the game is good, some test levels are hard, but CO-OP is great
